column1: Gauge formerly at stn 612 Bournemouth(East cliff)
Observer lived at Little Picket Hightown when she died
Where she lived at this time unknown so using MIDAS NGR
This is about 100yrds NE of Little Picket and at 275ft
To get to 250ft the gauge would have been about 200ft further south
1949 Oct 20 Old Glaisher grm to be used until new measure is sent
1949 Nov 1 New 5in measure taken into use
1953 May 11 Inspection Sheltered to E by trees Nearest 31ft 45ft away Trees are on neighbouring land and cannot be lopped but growth is slow
